privacy_policy: Privacy Policy For {botname} Effective Date: 02 August 2024 This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you interact with our Telegram bot designed for group management. 1. Information We Collect When you use our Telegram bot, we may collect the following types of information: - User Information: Basic information such as your Telegram ID, username, and any other data you choose to provide. - Group Information: Data related to the groups you manage, including group ID, group name, and member details. 2. How We Use Your Information We use the collected information to: - Manage and maintain group functionalities. - Provide support and improve our services. - Communicate important updates or changes related to the bot. 3. How We Protect Your Information We implement various security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, please be aware that no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. 4. Sharing Your Information We do not share your information with third parties, except as required by law or as necessary to provide the services described. 5. Your Rights You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. If you wish to exercise any of these rights, please contact us directly through the bot. 6. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by updating the policy in the bot. It is your responsibility to review this policy periodically. 7. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our practices, please contact us my owner.
